title: Prioritize Your Life and Get All Your Ducks in a Row: By Following the Imprint of God
description: Are you tired of living in chaos? Do you need a short, dynamic guide to help you get things in order? Prioritize Your Life and Get All Your Ducks in a Row, is perhaps one of the best short reads on the market. Specially written for personal growth and prioritization, this practical, authentic book will teach you what it really means to follow God and finally get your priorities straight. Hereâ€™s what you will take >how one little change can make all the difference >how to make your husband a priority (even when you don't feel like it!) >how to really connect with your kids (even teenagers) >how to find time for friends and personal get-a-ways (without the guilt!) >how "me time" fits into the scheme of things (you do fit in!) >dozens of tips and resources to help you prioritize your life and get all your ducks in a row No more wondering how to juggle it all! This book spells it out for you--start-to-finish. Your spouse will be pleasantly surprised. Your kids will gain confidence. Your friends will ask what your secret is. And most of all, your relationship with God will flourish. GRAB YOUR COPY TODAY!
author: Jennifer Waddle
